tag_list: creative, sales, marketing, advertising, digital, storyteller, leader
overview:
Media Solutions Lead, Brand Sector for Google, Inc.

Jared Zlotnick leads Google’s media solutions practice for brand marketers nationally. His focus is the development of new products and solutions, helping major marketers and media agency partners in the Consumer Packaged Goods and Food/Beverage/Restaurant industries adapt to the new digital marketing realities.

Based in Google’s New York office, Jared has a passion for rethinking advertising so communication rings true. His expertise in social and mobile has led to campaigns featured in The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, Forbes, Mobile Marketer, and Mashable, as well as earning Mobile Marketing Association’s “Best Promotion”.

Jared has previously held positions at Hyperknowledge (semantic web technology), AOL, and appssavvy. Jared is a graduate of Emory University, with a major in Economics and minor in Ethics.
